name: LUMBERMANCER
description: You're a Lumbermancer! Use your dark lumber magic to summon logs to do your bidding. Control both the Lumbermancer and the logs simultaneously to fight the creatures of the woods and steal their mysterious lunches!SUMMON LOGS! FIGHT THE DEVIL! EAT A SANDWICH!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: While I really enjoyed this fun little game, that is simple in the concept yet unique and fun. It really made me sad how many bugs and glitches I'v encountered in it.    About The Game

Played about 30+ mins before bed, the game drops you right in to a fight,with no real instruction, i read the controls from the pause menu option though and found it much easier with my controller. Fighting seems good, though the mancer is a tad too slow in my opinion. Had fun playing, love the mechanics and the aesthetic, beautiful art design, definitely plan on playing more later!! Worth the price and more
